title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link. When the user restarts the application and goes to the welcome page, clicking on any link in the welcome page executes the appropriate action. However, when the user returns to the welcome page, the clicked link is not selected. It would be helpful if links were selected when clicked to provide more context to the user upon returning to the welcome page. Currently, the ProductInfoDialog dialog already has this behavior.
OB:
1. Install build 20021001 and ensure that a welcome page is displayed upon restarting the application.
2. Remove the welcome line in the prefstore.ini file of the workbench metadata.
3. Click on any link in the welcome page.
4. Observe that the appropriate action is executed, but the clicked link is not selected when you return to the welcome page.
EB: When a link in the welcome page is clicked, the clicked link should be selected and visible when the user returns to the welcome page.
SR: Implement a feature where links in the welcome page are selected and displayed as selected when clicked, in order to provide more context to the user upon returning to the welcome page.
